articles.title: Charlie Flanagan apologises for 'tone' of tweet calling Paul Murphy's march in Egypt a 'circus'
articles.description: He was met with significant backlash online.
articles.content:
THE CHAIR OF the Irish Red Cross Charlie Flanagan has apologised for the “tone” of a tweet calling Dublin TD Paul Murphy’s trip to Egypt to participate in a march calling for aid to be supplied to Gaza a “circus”.

articles.description: Welcome back to Week in Review! We have lots for you this week, including what came out of WWDC 2025; The Browser Company's AI browser; OpenAI's partnership with Mattel; and your iPad might finally be a true work machine.

articles.title: Sir Keir Starmer announces national inquiry into grooming gangs
articles.description: Sir Keir Starmer said he had accepted the recommendations of an audit into the nature and scale of the abuse.
articles.content:
PM announces national inquiry into grooming gangs
For months, Sir Keir has faced criticism for not being willing to set one up.
Baroness Casey has recommended a national inquiry is required, he said. The inquiry will cover England and Wales.

articles.title: Israel says attacks on Iran are 'nothing' compared with what is coming
articles.description: JERUSALEM/DUBAI - Iran and Israel traded missiles and airstrikes on Saturday, the day after Israel launched a sweeping air offensive against its old enemy, killing commanders and scientists and bombing nuclear sites in a stated bid to stop it building an atomic weapon.
articles.content:

articles.title: Carbon dioxide removal methods could worsen marine oxygen loss, study warns
articles.description: Methods to enhance the ocean's uptake of carbon dioxide (CO₂) are being explored to help tackle the climate crisis. However, some of these approaches could significantly exacerbate ocean deoxygenation. Their potential impact on marine oxygen must therefore be systematically considered when assessing their suitability.
articles.content:
This article has been reviewed according to Science X's editorial process and policies . Editors have highlighted the following attributes while ensuring the content's credibility:
